view.router
Class JGraphParallelFlexibleRouter

java.lang.Object
  org.jgraph.graph.DefaultEdge.LoopRouting
      view.router.JGraphParallelFlexibleRouter
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, org.jgraph.graph.Edge.Routing
public class JGraphParallelFlexibleRouter
extends org.jgraph.graph.DefaultEdge.LoopRouting

Routing algorithm which creates intermediate points for a line such that the line is parallel to all other existing lines between the same source and target. One of the parallel edges does not contain a routing algorithm and can therefore accept additional control points and can be dragged. The correct intermediate points for the routed lines are calculated from the edge that doesn't have a routing algorithm applied to it.

See Also:
Serialized Form
